name: CreateAccountActivity
description:
Creates a new activity for a specified account.

Use this tool to add a new activity to an account by providing the account's internal or external ID. It will confirm the creation of the activity.

parameters.name: account_id_for_activity
parameters.description: The internal or external ID of the account to create the activity for. Accepts a UUID or any string format.

value_schema.description: The ID or external ID of the account to create the activity for.

parameters.name: activity_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing details about the activity, including optional fields like body_html, contact_id, happened_at, link, link_text, slug, and user_id.

body_html.description: Optional HTML content to display in the activity.

contact_id.description: Optional contact ID of the actor of the activity.

happened_at.description: Timestamp (RFC3339) of when the activity happened. Defaults to the current time if empty.

link.description: Optional link to add to the activity.

link_text.description: Optional link text to display on the activity. Defaults to "Open link" if not provided. Applies only if a link is provided.

slug.description: The slug of the activity to create.

user_id.description: Optional user ID of the actor of the activity.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the pylon API.
